trans-unit.source:
\n

Defines the access rights to use when you create access and audit rules.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxxx xxx xxxxxx xxxxxx xx xxx xxxx xxx xxxxxx xxxxxx xxx xxxxx xxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Specifies the right to make changes to the system access control list (SACL).

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxxxxx xxx xxxxx xx xxxx xxxxxxx xx xxx xxxxxx xxxxxx xxxxxxx xxxx $XXXX$.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Specifies the right to change the security and audit rules that are associated with a pipe.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxxxxx xxx xxxxx xx xxxxxx xxx xxxxxxxx xxx xxxxx xxxxx xxxx xxx xxxxxxxxxx xxxx x xxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Specifies the right to delete a pipe.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxxxxx xxx xxxxx xx xxxxxx x xxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Specifies the right to exert full control over a pipe, and to modify access control and audit rules.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxxxxx xxx xxxxx xx xxxxx xxxx xxxxxxx xxxx x xxxx$ xxx xx xxxxxx xxxxxx xxxxxxx xxx xxxxx xxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
This value represents the combination of all rights in this enumeration.

\n
trans-unit.target: Xxxx xxxxx xxxxxxxxxx xxx xxxxxxxxxxx xx xxx xxxxxx xx xxxx xxxxxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Specifies the right to read file system attributes from a pipe.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxxxxx xxx xxxxx xx xxxx xxxx xxxxxx xxxxxxxxxx xxxx x xxxx.

trans-unit.source:
This does not include the right to read data, extended file system attributes, or access and audit rules.

\n
trans-unit.target: Xxxx xxxx xxx xxxxxxx xxx xxxxx xx xxxx xxxx$ xxxxxxxx xxxx xxxxxx xxxxxxxxxx$ xx xxxxxx xxx xxxxx xxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Specifies the right to read data from the pipe.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxxxxx xxx xxxxx xx xxxx xxxx xxxx xxx xxxx.

trans-unit.source:
This does not include the right to read file system attributes, extended file system attributes, or access and audit rules.

\n
trans-unit.target: Xxxx xxxx xxx xxxxxxx xxx xxxxx xx xxxx xxxx xxxxxx xxxxxxxxxx$ xxxxxxxx xxxx xxxxxx xxxxxxxxxx$ xx xxxxxx xxx xxxxx xxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Specifies the right to read extended file system attributes from a pipe.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxxxxx xxx xxxxx xx xxxx xxxxxxxx xxxx xxxxxx xxxxxxxxxx xxxx x xxxx.

trans-unit.source:
This does not include the right to read data, file system attributes, or access and audit rules.

\n
trans-unit.target: Xxxx xxxx xxx xxxxxxx xxx xxxxx xx xxxx xxxx$ xxxx xxxxxx xxxxxxxxxx$ xx xxxxxx xxx xxxxx xxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Specifies the right to read access and audit rules from the pipe.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxxxxx xxx xxxxx xx xxxx xxxxxx xxx xxxxx xxxxx xxxx xxx xxxx.

trans-unit.source:
This does not include the right to read data, file system attributes, or extended file system attributes.

\n
trans-unit.target: Xxxx xxxx xxx xxxxxxx xxx xxxxx xx xxxx xxxx$ xxxx xxxxxx xxxxxxxxxx$ xx xxxxxxxx xxxx xxxxxx xxxxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Specifies whether the application can wait for a pipe handle to synchronize with the completion of an I/O operation.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxxxxx xxxxxxx xxx xxxxxxxxxxx xxx xxxx xxx x xxxx xxxxxx xx xxxxxxxxxxx xxxx xxx xxxxxxxxxx xx xx X$X xxxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Specifies the right to change the owner of a pipe.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxxxxx xxx xxxxx xx xxxxxx xxx xxxxx xx x xxxx.

trans-unit.source:
Note that owners of a pipe have full access to that resource.

\n
trans-unit.target: Xxxx xxxx xxxxxx xx x xxxx xxxx xxxx xxxxxx xx xxxx xxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Specifies the right to write file system attributes to a pipe.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxxxxx xxx xxxxx xx xxxxx xxxx xxxxxx xxxxxxxxxx xx x xxxx.

trans-unit.source:
This does not include the right to write data or extended file system attributes.

\n
trans-unit.target: Xxxx xxxx xxx xxxxxxx xxx xxxxx xx xxxxx xxxx xx xxxxxxxx xxxx xxxxxx xxxxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Specifies the right to write data to a pipe.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxxxxx xxx xxxxx xx xxxxx xxxx xx x xxxx.

trans-unit.source:
This does not include the right to write file system attributes or extended file system attributes.

\n
trans-unit.target: Xxxx xxxx xxx xxxxxxx xxx xxxxx xx xxxxx xxxx xxxxxx xxxxxxxxxx xx xxxxxxxx xxxx xxxxxx xxxxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Specifies the right to write extended file system attributes to a pipe.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxxxxx xxx xxxxx xx xxxxx xxxxxxxx xxxx xxxxxx xxxxxxxxxx xx x xxxx.

trans-unit.source:
This does not include the right to write file attributes or data.

\n
trans-unit.target: Xxxx xxxx xxx xxxxxxx xxx xxxxx xx xxxxx xxxx xxxxxxxxxx xx xxxx.$$x$$x
